body:
In commit "Add src/node/* code to node:: namespace" (733a629696ef3350e5c9c861ae94254a06cc920b)

Note: This line can be removed after #23499, since calling `node::BroadcastTransaction` from the bitcoin-gui process doesn't work in the multiprocess build (there is a segfault because the NodeContext pointer this tries to pass is null). This is a preexisting bug, independent of this PR.

Updated 768b695296e343da0163e07e25f08dfbc6f58e1d -> 8c85a48eac8a0a9512e754f29c173c2ce9e55308 ([`pr/names.1`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/names.1) -> [`pr/names.2`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/names.2), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/names.1..pr/names.2)) with tweaks to clean up and fix errors in dummy wallet and multiprocess builds https://cirrus-ci.com/task/5598684416049152 and https://cirrus-ci.com/task/6161634369470464

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23417](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23417) (wallet, spkm: Move key management from DescriptorScriptPubKeyMan to wallet level KeyManager by achow101)
* [#23373](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23373) (Parse command line arguments from unit and fuzz tests, make addrman consistency check ratio easier to change by vasild)
* [#23367](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23367) (Optimize coin selection by dropping BnB upper limit by S3RK)
* [#23362](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23362) (util: Add "importfromcoldcard" command to bitcoin-wallet tool by hebasto)
* [#23319](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23319) (rpc: Return fee and prevout (utxos) to getrawtransaction by dougEfresh)
* [#23155](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23155) (rpc: various fixups for dumptxoutset by jamesob)
* [#23095](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23095) (refactor: Use C++17 std::clamp by hebasto)
* [#22019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22019) (wallet: Introduce SelectionResult for encapsulating a coin selection solution by achow101)
* [#21763](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21763) (test: Run AppInitSanityChecks before all tests by MarcoFalke)
* [#21726](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21726) (Improve Indices on pruned nodes via prune blockers by fjahr)
* [#20640](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20640) (wallet, refactor: return out-params of CreateTransaction() as optional struct by theStack)
* [#20295](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20295) (rpc: getblockfrompeer by Sjors)
* [#20205](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20205) (wallet: Properly support a wallet id by achow101)
* [#19602](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19602) (wallet: Migrate legacy wallets to descriptor wallets by achow101)
* [#10443](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10443) (Add fee_est tool for debugging fee estimation code by ryanofsky)
* [#10102](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10102) (Multiprocess bitcoin by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
